strategy.title: Requirements
steps: Win 100 battles in Eye of the Storm

strategy.title: Efficient Grinding
steps: Focus on one battleground at a time
Queue during that BG's bonus weekend for faster queues
Play during peak hours for shorter queue times
Join as a group for better coordination and win rate

strategy.title: Tips
steps: AV is often fastest due to PvE objectives
AB and EotS reward map control - stick with your team
WSG can be slow if games stall - bring a flag carrier class
Track progress with /statistics or achievement panel
